title: Machine Learning Engineer Interview Guide
description: Prepare for ML systems, modeling, and production ML interviews.

content.text: MLE interviews assess your ability to build and deploy ML systems at scale. Expect ML theory, coding, system design for ML, and discussions about production challenges like monitoring and retraining.

**What interviewers assess:**

- ML fundamentals and algorithm knowledge
- Production ML systems experience
- Software engineering skills
- Problem framing and feature engineering
- MLOps and model lifecycle management

**Typical MLE interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Technical phone screen** (60 min) - ML concepts or coding
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (5-6 hours):
   - ML theory/breadth round
   - ML system design
   - Coding round
   - Applied ML case study
   - Behavioral round
For ML system design, don't jump to model architecture. Start with problem definition, success metrics, data requirements, and how you'd iterate.

items.text: Classical ML algorithms and when to use them
Review ML algorithms and their trade-offs
Brush up on Python and ML libraries (sklearn, PyTorch)
Prepare to discuss past ML projects end-to-end
Understand model serving and monitoring strategies
Review A/B testing for ML models
